title: Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (Designated Body) (No. 3) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (designated body) (no 3) order 2023

title: Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014), following consultation with
heading: 2. The Irish Air Navigation Service, being the company of that name
text_raw:
2. The Irish Air Navigation Service, being the company of that name 
formed pursuant to section 10 of the Air Navigation and Transport Act 2022 
(No. 40 of 2022), shall be a designated body for the purposes of Part 3 of the 
National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No.23 of 
2014). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 September, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [479] 3
